content.raw: I'd also like to add a feed-forward term to this class, since that is commonly used ([drcsim for example](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/src/18812da1f459edfb1a06535b33d7df82d9931628/atlas_msgs/msg/AtlasCommand.msg?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#AtlasCommand.msg-14)). I'm working on adding it.
content.html: I'd also like to add a feed-forward term to this class, since that is commonly used (drcsim for example). I'm working on adding it.

content.raw: Currently `imax` and `imin` default to zero, so integral control is disabled by default. I'd like to change this so that `imax` default to `-1` and the clamping logic is similar to the `cmd` clamping
content.html: Currently imax and imin default to zero, so integral control is disabled by default. I'd like to change this so that imax default to -1 and the clamping logic is similar to the cmd clamping

content.raw:
there's a slight change to the integral error saturation that was used in drcsim; I'll provide a patch shortly

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issues/92/request-to-provide-integral-tie-back
content.html:
there's a slight change to the integral error saturation that was used in drcsim; I'll provide a patch shortly

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issues/92/request-to-provide-integral-tie-back
